name: SYSTEMCRASHER
description:
//Your computer  is infected with evil viruses!

//Play as the antivirus to stop them

//By terminating viruses you steal their code so you can evolve yourself using their code.

// CONTROLS //

W|A|S|D   - Movement

TAB - Evolve menu

Mouse1 - Shoot/Drag code block

//MADE BY

ChaoticAurora

Twenmod

//Made in 48 hours for the ScoreSpace #24 Game Jam
